website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for a powerful machine that's easy to use, this is a strong contender.
pros: EZ-Pull recoil system is incredibly easy to use in order to start the machine
Can power large appliances and power tools
Includes various outlet options for maximum compatibility

customer_reviews.title: Saved the day
customer_reviews.text: I got the generator at noon, I gave it a quick test run, Attached the wheel kit and stored it my garage. At 6pm we had an outage, I pulled out the generator, started it, Attached my long extended cord and saved the day! The first run was very simple, I just followed the instructions. The only problem I had, is that the generator not coming with any oil, I had gas in advance but needed to jump to the gas station to buy 10w-30 oil.
customer_reviews.author: Rami

customer_reviews.title: NO, don't buy this!
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy things like generators off Amazon - No support! Ran the first time 4 months ago and now it doesn't. If you want to learn about how gas motors work then this one is for you! Called tech and I've drained gas out, replaced the spark plug, replaced the oil, sprayed the carburetor, removed the carburetor for cleaning and it still doesn't work. If I'd bought this from Costco or any other brick and mortar store I could have just taken it back. I'm out $ and time I've spent on this POS.
customer_reviews.author: jahMoon

customer_reviews.title: Powerhouse.
customer_reviews.text: Been running this on propane and it runs good. Conflicting instructions, some say don't choke for propane and others say do choke. I had to choke. Ajighle the choke lever until you get it running really smooth. Also, instruction sheets were hidden on top of motor when I got it and ignition keys are in that packet, so I had to call company to figure out where they were. Negative battery cable needed to be connected, none of instructions tell you that, I had to read the reviews. That all said it seems to run good.
customer_reviews.author: Janine Smith/Steve Citron

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this generator prior to Irma hitting Florida. ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this generator prior to Irma hitting Florida. It's been running non-stop for four days now. It's running two refrigerators, entertainment system, various fans, a portable air conditioner, and various other odds and ends. Five gallons of gas seems to last about 17 hours. I'm impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Lunatic

customer_reviews.title: The engine runs fine, but no electricity is being generated
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this unit a couple of years ago. It has run for max 10 hours total, and now it will not generate electricity. The engine runs fine, but no electricity is being generated, no activity on voltmeter, no power in outlets. Can not be relied upon in emergencies.
customer_reviews.author: EatMoreVeggies

customer_reviews.title: Oil leaks out
customer_reviews.text: Stay away from this DOG! After using this for about 2 months, oil started leaking out of the air filter housing. I called the vendor and was told that this is "NORMAL." Really? Does anyone want a lawnmower, snow blower, a car, or any motor to leak oil? Isn't this a form of ground pollution and contamination if nothing else?
customer_reviews.author: Adriano

customer_reviews.title: Cranked right up after 4 years in storage
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in 2012 since we live in South Louisiana and the hurricane threats. I initially fired it and put a load on it to make sure it worked. I put it away and kinda forgot about it....... 4 years later and this horrible flooding hits southern Louisiana and this lil gem keeps our refrigerator, small window AC , lamp and fan running for 60 hours. We were able to power our uverse router and also charge up our small electronics. I did change the oil in it after a few hours which is very simple, it also did very well on gas.
customer_reviews.author: A. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work, Customer Support won't answer, Amazon won't honor their return.
customer_reviews.text: I've been having trouble with this generator running correctly since I first bought it. It takes a while to start then runs very rough when it does start. I've tried everything with adjusting fuel flow and ensuring the choke isn't closed. I've tried calling the support number and get no answer, like other reviewers have stated. I'm now trying to return it and Amazon won't let me even though my return window is through January 31st. The only option Amazon gives me is to try to contact Durostar Support (which I already have). Very dissatisfied with this prouduct and Amazon's unwillingness to accept a return.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this product.
customer_reviews.text: This is a POS. Purchased on Jan. 17, 2019. Here it is Jan 28, 2019, there is terrible cold snap coming and it will not start. If I could give it NO STARS, I would. The gas cap will not stay on it, don't care how tight you think it is. The motor mounts have shredded themselves in under 30 hours of operation. I've had and used generators for decades. This is the first one I've ever had be totally worthless. Just do not even consider buying this. Not kidding.
customer_reviews.author: Wiser Buyer Now

customer_reviews.title: Best Generator on the market! Runs like a champ!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well made product. We had some issues with delivery because of Fed Ex, not the shipper, but after a phone call they handled everything and our product was received on time. The generator is heavy duty no issues running a 32 ft camper all night without having to fill the tank during the night.
customer_reviews.author: Chris H

customer_reviews.title: Only worked for 3 months
customer_reviews.text: I bought it Aug 21 2017 and this DuroStar DS4000S is already not working for 2 weeks now and today is Dec 04 2017
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Smith

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Generator was missing parts. The included instructions are for a different generator. Included paperwork states that there is a bleed port on the propane line, there is no bleed port. Buyer beware you may get last years model repackaged. I feel I got ripped off!!!
customer_reviews.author: E. Fahsbender

customer_reviews.title: Wheels NOT included, but shown in pictures and on the box
customer_reviews.text: Looks pretty and well made, but... deceives you into thinking it has a wheel kit included. I mean why would you include a picture showing wheels attached with a caption "easy to transport" if the wheels are not attached or even included? I now have it sitting upside down in the middle of my living room with no wheels to put on it and believe me it is super heavy and cumbersome without wheels. Gonna have to ask my son to assist me moving it outside and look into paying more than I expected to get what was advertised in the pictures as included. Will update my review of the seller decides to ship me a wheel kit for free.
customer_reviews.author: James St. Onge

customer_reviews.title: BLEW UP AFTER LESS THAN A YEAR!
customer_reviews.text: I had a carb problem and called them and they said I had to fix it instead of them replacing the generator to take care of the customer? I did and it worked great. I always replace the oil every 50 hours and it has light duty use every day. It started smoking a little bit at start. Shortly after that I started it and It and then I'm assuming the rings completely went and blew up! I'm not even going to call them for a replacement they will just tell me to Rebuild the engine probably knowing them after the first time instead replacing it under warranty. This generator and company is the absolute worst. Good luck.
customer_reviews.author: ZBECKMAST3R

customer_reviews.title: Oil Tank Came Filled w/ Questionable Substance
customer_reviews.text: The item came quickly. It was slightly delayed by Winter Storm Jonas which is understandable. The packaging was good and everything was intact and undamaged. I'm impressed with the construction and design. HOWEVER, as I was pulling it out I noticed a small pool of oil in the bottom of the box. Upon taking it out, I noticed the oil tank was full. The contents, however, was thin and felt/looked/smelled like an oil/gas mix. The gas tank was empty and didn't have the slightest odor of gas. This item wasn't supposed to have anything in it, let alone a questionable substance. EDIT: Amazon made it right so I'm going to drain the oil tank and go from there.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap included tools
customer_reviews.text: Step one is to remove the shipping brace from the motor which is held on by 4 bolts. One wrench for the bolt head, one wrench for the nut. Ive chipped both wrenches after 2 bolts and the remaining 2 are impossible to remove without external tools. No idea why someone decided that a part just to keep the engine from shifting in the frame needed to be torqued down to 95ft pounds and includes tiny 6in wrenches to try to free them. A socket and breaker bar will be needed to remove that.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Espinoza

customer_reviews.title: We had to return this item because it would not ...
customer_reviews.text: We had to return this item because it would not work. I am very unhappy. The generator came just in time but did not work. I lost all the food in my refrigerator.
customer_reviews.author: violet fleck

customer_reviews.title: Compact and Powerful
customer_reviews.text: Generator arrived in perfect conditions. Instructions are not completely clear and pictures don't help either, but assembly is very simple. Added the needed liquids and it started right away. I am able to power my entire house with this unit. 2,500 sqft with a 4ton central A/C. Now we will need to see how long it will last. Also looking to convert it to LG/NP/Fuel very soon.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar Dominguez

customer_reviews.title: Major Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually write reviews, but I feel a duty to save others. It was brand new, $340, and it didn't work even once. I don't know much about engines though, but since it was brand new, it should work if I follow the instructions, without much need for troubleshooting, right? Not only that, but Durostar won't accept a return, even though I asked for one just days after I received the generator. This was very frustrating, and I will never buy from Durostar again, only from Amazon, and only other brands of generators.
customer_reviews.author: Primary buyer

customer_reviews.title: Everything I needed in one unit
customer_reviews.text: The generator wheel assembly was easy to install, the propane hose and upgraded regulator was already installed on the unit, the key and instruction manual was under fuel tank on top of motor, also included are plug ends to make new electric cord ends. Very nice deal and generator! Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Greene

customer_reviews.title: Generator
customer_reviews.text: Great 50 amp generator for most 3/2 homes under 1500 sq ft! We tested it with our 220 A/C, 3 ceiling fans,55 in tv, lights and 3 refrigerators running no problem. Wouldn’t want the A/C and stove or microwave running at the same time! Be cautious and safe
customer_reviews.author: rena reiff

customer_reviews.title: Easy start, handles fairly large electrical load
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for backup since I live in the hurricane belt. Putting it together wasn’t too difficult since I’m 71 and have arthritis in my knee and 3 degenerative disc in my back. Oil is difficult to add without spilling! But once put together, it started immediately and produce enough power to run my freezer, refrigerator, microwave, floor fan and several lamps at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: tom walket

customer_reviews.title: Terrible experience
customer_reviews.text: This was a terrible purchase. Very disappointed. It had a broken connection to the spark plug that wasnt visible at first glance. Bought it for a camping trip and my trip was a disaster due to this. It also doesn't receive proper airflow thru the filter with the filter cover on. Upon trying to process a return due to being damaged or defective the only option I am given is to contact a product support hotline thru the seller.. Unacceptable. It was 115 degrees and I was unable to run my air or fan for more than 5 mins. The last thing I care to do is sit on the phone with some hotline.
customer_reviews.author: Cwille

customer_reviews.title: Works like a champ
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for hurricane season... of course I was hoping not to have to use it. Then came Irma. Lost my power for five days. All I had to do was put in 10W30 oil and regular unleaded gas in and pull. Started right up. Ran for about 8 hours on a tank of gas. Changed the oil at 10 and 20 hours. A real life saver.
customer_reviews.author: Lucychas

customer_reviews.title: Money well spent!!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome, worth every penny. Starts first time, every time, very efficient and round everything in my house. Couldn't be happier, on my 6 th power outage here in fire prone California, this thing Is a life saver...
customer_reviews.author: Kevin C. Haywood

customer_reviews.title: Very simple to operate,and quiet.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good.The generator was fairly easy to assemble if you follow the instructions verbatum,which I rarely do.After putting oil and gas in her.I gave her several pulls to get oil distributed throughout the engine.I turned on the gas,and she started on the first pull of the cord.I will say this as far as generators go this one is fairly quiet.I will conduct my load test tomorrow to ensure everything is in order electrically.
customer_reviews.author: James W. Johnson, Jr

customer_reviews.title: i've got the power
customer_reviews.text: although it came two days later than scheduled seller is refunding me for my inconvenience of waiting by the mailbox all day long... carried it down the hill... put in oil and gas... gas on... ignition on... generator off... choke closed... pulled string... poof instant start with only a partial pull. opened choke... turned generator on.. ran my low watt single outfit washing machine and washed my clothes... at same time charged laptop and two cell phones and jamed on.my keyboard.... got carried away and ran it almost the full twelve hours to use all the gas... lol. very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Channah

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend this item
customer_reviews.text: Perhaps this is a good generator I’ll never know. I got it with a broken wire as you see by the picture and the frame dented. It seems like a sturdy generator but I would not recommend it. Also; it’s worth noting that this generator does not come with any accessories. Some generators come with oil, funnel, spark plug wrench, etc. this particular generator does not. Another reason I will look at another generator to replace this one.
customer_reviews.author: DoggieDadVATop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Unrefined but works
customer_reviews.text: This thing is loud, heavy, even with wheels. It’s one of the cheaper options compared to others online but still the price is higher now than it was a couple of years ago. Other than that it’s pretty straight forward. Fill gas, put oil, check the air filter, turn switches and choke off. Pull cord, turn choke on, flip switches on, plug in appliances. It is so loud I want to run a long extension cord from it from far away. Considering a muffler + exhaust kit. Put wheel kit on and it’s still heavy, just slightly easier to lug around.
customer_reviews.author: BK

customer_reviews.title: Did not come with key
customer_reviews.text: The generator arrived on time but did not come with the key. I have been trying to get one sent to me from the manufacturer for almost 3 weeks now...
customer_reviews.author: Kate Dimond

customer_reviews.title: Won’t start
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a back up power source for my sump pump. Wrong choice all the way around. I’m a senior so moving it is very difficult. I had someone start it up initially and I’ve never been able to start it again. I paid a plumber to look at it and he couldn’t find anything wrong but couldn’t get it started. My money is wasted. I don’t know what to get now as a still need s back up power source.
customer_reviews.author: SylviaSue

customer_reviews.title: Ordered on April 11, 2018 never started until today
customer_reviews.text: Ordered on April 11, 2018 and today (November 18, 2019) we pulled it out from under the porch and we took tarp off and added gas and oil and it started right away. It sounded great as if we just bought it. Awesome sounding generator and it's a bit loud but that's ok as long as it works right? So thumbs up for it ran perfect !
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomerUSA

customer_reviews.title: Great generator for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome generator. Quick start, easy to run and the auto idle is as easy to apply with a flick of a switch. Highly recommend it. I have had 5 portables over the last 15 years, this is the best I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Gerard J.

customer_reviews.title: Have got 2 generators both are garbage do not buy save your self the trouble
customer_reviews.text: Purchase this and it does not generate any power, which is it’s sole purchase. I got my 2nd generator and it ran for long enough for me to feel comfortable going camping with it and then it died after 2 hours of running when it still says made for extended running 12 hours plus on the side would not recommend buying this generator ever because this is the 2nd event that has been ruined by this generator and I wholly took in it to 2 things
customer_reviews.author: Tosh

customer_reviews.title: No instructions included.
customer_reviews.text: My husband was dismayed to find there were no instructions in the box. Also, there was no oil included. He had to research and find out that it needed 30w oil. He was surprised by the fact that there was no oil since lawn mowers come with oil. After he got it started, he used the weed eater on it and it showed plenty of use left on the gauge. We got this for possible storms and hopefully will not have to find out the full use of power anytime soon.
customer_reviews.author: B. Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Not reliable !
customer_reviews.text: Reliability is, for me the most important consideration in having a generator. I bought this generator just before moving to an off grid property. It worked fine for two weeks then began having issues, the issue being it will run for one or two minutes then shut down and won't restart for an indefinite period of time, which of course is very frustrating....hence the reliability issue. I would not recommend this generator.
customer_reviews.author: steve kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly for the wheel kit and started up on ...
customer_reviews.text: Easy assembly for the wheel kit and started up on the second try . Sounds great with good decibel sound.
customer_reviews.author: David Davies

customer_reviews.title: So this is the beginning
customer_reviews.text: We have been without electricity from hurricane... it was desperately needed Unpack it first no bracket supports anywhere Thus somewhat bent railings but the topper Was the instructions were in .... Spanish Our internet is out so saga will continue
customer_reviews.author: Kenetta

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this purchase. Ran straight out of the box, no issues
customer_reviews.text: Put in oil and gas and pulled the cord and it worked for three days for us during the big ridiculous PGE power outage in California. I know we will have more of these black outs for the next few years, even though we live in a residential neighborhood with zero fire danger for 25 years I have lived here. California needs some decent leadership, and there seems to be none to be had.
customer_reviews.author: L.P

customer_reviews.title: Covered in oil when box was opened.
customer_reviews.text: So excited to get this for emergencies. Opened the box to install wheel kit and it is covered in oil. The plastic, foam sides, the whole generator is covered in oil. It specifically states that it is shipped without oil, but yet there is oil in the tank. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Emergency back-up power...peace of mind!
customer_reviews.text: This unit is a bargain for emergency back-up power for the main items in my home....gas furnace...two refrigerators....cable modems....tv's...and needed LED lighting. The dual fuel option is a big plus...able to leave the gas tank empty until needed so fuel doesnt get old. Electric start with propane source to begin with...plug in to my pre-wired temp emergency feed to my house. Plus I built a fireproof enclosure to keep it dry and well vetilated outside a basement wall close the the main power panel. Exactly what I wanted at a great value, thank you, KW
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Waite

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded All Expectations
customer_reviews.text: This little generator is just fantastic!! It starts on the first pull, runs super efficiently for 12 hours on 5 gallons of gas and kept key appliances running after a storm knocked out power for 3 days. We stopped considering an in-line home generator due to the cost of buying, installing and operating that type of generator since power only goes out once every other year or so.. The only drawback is at first it seemed quiet, but it is a little noisy. We don't really have anything to compare the sound to, but it did get old after a few days (but still very worthwhile!).
customer_reviews.author: MAH

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first Durostar generator. Delivery was quick. However, shipped in manufacturing box. The box had damage; probably cos it’s a little heavy and delivered by one slim person. Luckily, the packaging was good enough to protect the generator. I used it the same day after adding fuel and oil. It fired up immediately. I had it hooked up to a pop-up camper. The generator provided more than enough power to operate all appliances and a/c. Good buy.. only thing left is durability and life of the generator!
customer_reviews.author: Satanpuppy

customer_reviews.title: I cannot connect all the supplies I have in my house but its been a great relief to use the refrigerator and some light bulbs
customer_reviews.text: I purchased it after hurricane Maria (I'm in Puerto Rico), I'm surprised for it. I cannot connect all the supplies I have in my house but its been a great relief to use the refrigerator and some light bulbs. The only reason I selected this one was because the excellent reviews. Its great. please don't use it for so long daily but it helps a lot!!
customer_reviews.author: Just Me

customer_reviews.title: Does what it’s supposed to do!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this prior to Dorian so we and our pets wouldn’t have to suffer in the heat. We were in Florence and lost power for 2 weeks. This ran well during Dorian and was a life safer. Hooked up fridge and window unit. Happy happy.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Ewell

customer_reviews.title: Awesomeness
customer_reviews.text: I have used this generator every day for 3 months. It has been great. Started right up after I connected the negative wire on the battery.(I uploaded some pictures) This is used daily without any trouble. Not too loud, it is louder than a Honda Inverter generator but what isn't for this price point. Great machine... really...
customer_reviews.author: Dave Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is an inexpensive generator for emergency use and to use in the yard to avoid having to haul out long extension cords. The frequency of the AC power is determined by the governor-controlled gasoline engine, so don't expect great frequency stability or accuracy. I got a wheel kit with it which had bad welds and is of limited use.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne L. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Generator to power my house during outages!
customer_reviews.text: Received this Generator from MaxTool, no issues with shipping at all. The Generator was well packed and arrived in perfect condition. Followed the instructions to set it up (Minor assembly required to attach wheel set), loaded it with oil and gas and it fired right up with the turn of the key. Verified a nice 119VAC output with my meter, little fluctuation. Highly recommended this unit as the electric start is a really nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: SF

customer_reviews.title: A Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly! Like most it’s not quiet but I never expected it to be. I’m impressed with how easily it sets up. Added fuel and oil, 1 pull and it was off to the races. Now it’s heavy so I recommend doing what I did and strapping it to a hardwood end dolly. I roll it around without any trouble at all. Does well on fuel economy and performs smoothly. It’s everything we were looking for in case of a major power outage.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Waldman

customer_reviews.title: Great machine.
customer_reviews.text: Storm blew through lastnight. Ran for 14 hours non-stop. 9 plus hours on a tank of fuel. Multiple tv's, washing machine, skillet, ps4's, fans, cable modem, wifi, and lights. Very happy with the machine. Must recommend.
customer_reviews.author: jim l

customer_reviews.title: Good generator, works great for our needs.
customer_reviews.text: It works great. It is noisy but it’s ok. We use a ramp to maneuver it in and out of the back of our truck to take it somewhere. We needed power to our storage unit so we could have electricity, and it was in an industrial area, so noise was not a problem. We’ve always thought we needed one, just in case of power outages. Good price and quality product. Good tech help from the website .
customer_reviews.author: Susan W.

customer_reviews.title: Hurricane Sally Lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: This little guy just got done running 72 hours for us only needing gas a couple of times. We were running a a box fan, cell chargers, fridge, carpet cleaner (to extract water), and the garage door. Hurricane Sally flooded us, but once the water lowered enough to move this outside, it got right to work. Did just what we needed when we needed it most, pray to God we never truly need it again.
customer_reviews.author: cbrook01

customer_reviews.title: Great generator, does it be much better then a ...
customer_reviews.text: Great generator, does it be much better then a cheap generator that also comes with two day shipping! runs to about the normal level of sound as one of equal size. Start up on this product is fast and easy. If you do not want to be carrying this thing around i know the next model up is not a crazy price difference is does come with wheels, but this is only 50 lbs and has many placed to put your hands and carry it from one location to the next. Also this generator does not eat up gas like ones i have had in the past, it is crazy how energy efficient it is.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Kordas

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality product.
customer_reviews.text: Frame was bent when received (see picture, tube frame is not straight). Air intake was snapped off (see picture). No wheel mounts included. Generates power but not for long since the air cleaner is non-functional without spending more money to fix it. Bad experience and would not recommend. Want money back but products that have oil or gas can’t be returned. What a waste.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: It's chinese but still works decent
customer_reviews.text: This welder will definitely work for small farm use if its not being used all the time. The bottom frame and wheels are garbage and one would be wise to go ahead and try out the new welder on something better. The engine and welder itself worked flawless for me and never any issues. I used it to weld a lot of fence and it penetrated thick pipe with ease. Good product with drawbacks that can be remedied
customer_reviews.author: Clint Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Get the right wheel kit
customer_reviews.text: Started and ran great on the second pull. I just started breaking it in, but it seems solid so far. A warning though- get the right wheel kit. It's too heavy to move around without it, but the one that Amazon offers on the same page ("Frequently bought together") is for a Champion generator and won't fit the Durastar. I had to go to Ebay to get mine.
customer_reviews.author: CWB

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Machine
customer_reviews.text: Came packaged correctly. Perfect delivery. Had braces and bracket support in package so the item wouldn't be damaged in transit. On the other hand, the wheel kit that you get is ok, but the tools they give you are more for a kid--sort of like mickey mouse tools. You will need real tools to assemble it. In any event, put fresh oil in the unit, (doesn't come with any). Fresh gas, turned the petcock to have the gas flow, put it on choke and gave it a pull. It started up no problem whatsoever. Ran a test on it and it held up no problem either. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: M.C.

customer_reviews.title: Customer Service phone lines sucks
customer_reviews.text: Product seems good for this price, however there’r a couple problems 1, Missing accessories (plugs & wheels) 2. 110v receptacles Jammed 3. Customers service phone sucks (wait more than 30min) Then tells me that due to corona problems it will take 72hrs to get back to me!! What can I expect from defective unit. They got paid so they don’t care???
customer_reviews.author: Fumio Hayashi

customer_reviews.title: There should be one in every Garage
customer_reviews.text: Best thing I've bought in years. I've already used it twice and its worked flawlessly both times. The instructions were easy to read and understand. It's a little nosier then I had expected but for what it does, the noise level is easy to overlook. For anyone dealing with power outages on any kind of basis, this little generator definitely will do the job of keeping the lights on and the refrigerator running. Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: JoeD

customer_reviews.title: Started right up
customer_reviews.text: Started right up once I figured out the choke. It wasn't clear form the description whether it came with wheels- it did not. But I got some generic wheels at home depot and am in business. At 85 lbs dry weight and then 5 lbs ish per gallon of gas they aren't really a luxury. I am now ready for the yearly power failure due to hurricanes and won't have to worry about my freezers / making coffee and charging electronics
customer_reviews.author: Gerry Mc

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I want to love this generator but for some reason the battery doesn't stay charged enough for the key start. Also, the tires are pretty cheap; I had the generator stored and the part that was touching the floor just went flat. Temparature has been over 90 these past few weeks but I have the DuroStar cover and it's under a roof; no direct sunlight. Overall still a great generator.
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: https/www.amazon.com/hz/feedback/list
customer_reviews.text: When I placed my review it was not against the generator I don't know how the first one sounds as we need to put the wheels on before we turn it over to use I'm just nervous about where the second unit is sitting. on the wheels the best call back is 956-787-2824 I am pleased we received the first unit quickly we give it a great review and ane even better one when it is running. sincerely Ruthie
customer_reviews.author: Ruthie

customer_reviews.title: Low quality of output electricity
customer_reviews.text: I have energy savings lights and if I use the generator all those lights start to blink even not turned on. I assume it is related to low quality of the electrical output.
customer_reviews.author: Cliente Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Starts Easily, Runs Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Bought this generator about 1 year ago. Still starts easily and runs perfectly. Use this only as an emergency power source for the house. It is well made, well designed, no problems. Works as intended. It does run loud but this is the nature of the beast so there is no negative from the noise issue. Because it is heavy, I purchased the wheel kit for this generator. The wheels are a necessity.
customer_reviews.author: Robert in Ohio

customer_reviews.title: This things is amazing for the money
customer_reviews.text: 5 years later and still running strong. It still starts on the first pull even after sitting in the garage during the winter (6 months). We've used it a lot to build a house without power. This things is amazing for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Conner

customer_reviews.title: DoroStar 12 k
customer_reviews.text: On arrival box was damaged and some bent on control panel.but didnt efect the controls. Used with propane and fired up quickly powering my 2000 sq ft home including my 3.5 ton a/c still I need to built a shed to enclose the generator because of noise to the next house. Overal very happy with the Durostar 12k.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Good generator
customer_reviews.text: After unpacking and placing my own casters on the bottom frame, it was a snap to start up. Be sure to add oil to the engine first, then gas up, follow the startup procedure and...woot it starts up nice. Not too loud, and plenty of power to route inside to run our furnace fan in case of power failure during storms.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware! Item doesn’t work. Return purposely made difficult.
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t like this product because it is incapable of powering a 200w electric skillet for more than 10 minutes. Every restart is increasingly difficult and frustrating. This unit is extremely loud. Also when I tried to return it, I am now being led on a merry chase by the manufacturer to avoid a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Michael B.

customer_reviews.title: $100 worth of additional parts needed.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed that you have to buy so many additional parts to use. Does not come with wheel kit. Does not come with grounding equipment. Add an additional $100 to your price. Buy something that comes with all of the parts.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Best

customer_reviews.title: Not a Beauty but a Worker
customer_reviews.text: Handles were bent and wheel kit was not the one shown nor the one in the directions. Generator itself seems in OK shape. Cost is in line with what is available in the area.
customer_reviews.author: thomas pulliam

customer_reviews.title: Keep Oil clean
customer_reviews.text: so far so good I’ve used it to start a heavy duty air compressor electric saw Sam lights I do recommend that you change the Oil when you first get it run it couple hours change your oil running five hours change your oil during Break in I’m using synthetic
customer_reviews.author: Brian Diederich

customer_reviews.title: Great product; however, no wheels included
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived one day late; however, once delivered, had unit unpacked, prepped and ready for use within 15 minutes. Main frustration is that there are no wheels included, which is not what is illustrated on the Amazon site... Having purchased the unit, I now see that Amazon do not have the wheel kit available (very helpful, not!)... The generator is 97 lbs. Other than the lack of wheels for maneuverability, the generator is great!
customer_reviews.author: D. Strong

customer_reviews.title: That its reliable and a good generator
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this generator I took it camping last month it worked like a charm It started right up the noise level isnt loud it's like a lawn mower it doesn't bother me I filled it up used it for 4 days and still had gas in it I let it run the last day so the gas could run out before we left I definitely would recommend this generator you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren washington

customer_reviews.title: Excellent portable generator!
customer_reviews.text: Living in the country in Florida, I have a lot of power outages, so was interested in a portable one. This sure filled the bill! Dual fuel and enough power to run multiple thing. I have been very pleased with it so far. I may never need it, but just in case, I’ll be prepared. I plan to use propane fuel!
customer_reviews.author: yram

customer_reviews.title: HOWEVER
customer_reviews.text: When we couldn't start our DS10000EH after following the instructions, we thought the battery needed to be charged. But, while hooking up the charger we discovered there was NO negative wire to the battery. Once we made a new wire and connected it to the engine frame, the generator started as it should. We wonder how this unit could have been tested without a starter, and what else might be missing. So far we haven't needed the wheels. HOWEVER, it seems to be running fine on day one.
customer_reviews.author: gayle shurtz cook

customer_reviews.title: For SHTF scenarios
customer_reviews.text: I've not cranked it up, nor will I in the future until SHTF happens. Since I've got two, one large and one small, both unused, I'll have them at the ready when I need them. If neither starts, then, well, I've got other avenues of approach to fend off SHTF scenarios. I've got backups to backups if you know what I mean.
customer_reviews.author: Johannes H. Benink Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Wheels Flat Spot and can't roll unit easily
customer_reviews.text: The generator is nice, runs well and does the job. The bad thing is you would think with a portable generator of this quality and expense that the wheels that are supplied would not flat spot over a short time. The wheels are a solid rubber (not inflated) and after the unit sits for much time on them, they flatten terribly. It makes moving the unit VERY difficult. They need better wheels!!!
customer_reviews.author: MIke Wyatt

customer_reviews.title: Never let me down!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in July 2012. Always starts the on the second pull. Runs great never had any problems whatsoever. Great little Portable Generator.
customer_reviews.author: Bev909

customer_reviews.title: Never Worked
customer_reviews.text: It's never worked right. It runs just fine, until a load is put on it (no matter how small—even a 5 watt LED bulb), and then it shuts down after about 10 minutes. I'll have to pay a repair shop to figure out what's wrong, but it's frustrating to have to pay for that, since it never worked right in the first place. But what was I gonna do, mail it back?
customer_reviews.author: Waldo Jaquith

customer_reviews.title: Great Generator for the device!
customer_reviews.text: WARNING RINGS WEAR OUT AND BURNS OIL & SPARK PLUG FOULS OUT! ! I was pleased it comes with a funnel for the oil fill which is very helpful. Great little Generator for the price runs 12-15 hours depending on load, type of fuel and type of oil! We used the purple synthetic 5W-30 oil @ 9600 feet during winter and worked GREAT!!!! NO issues at temps -12 degrees up to 58 ran like a champ!! So we will buy several more for next winter 😁 to replace the HF.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice generator I am very pleased with this product
customer_reviews.text: Minimal assembly required, added fluids and attached battery and it fired right up. I used it quite a bit as I was isolated from any other source of power and it worked great. I ran a 50 foot cord off it and never was more than that away from it and it ran quiet enough but hey its a generator if it isn't making noise it isn't working.
customer_reviews.author: Jason hammond

customer_reviews.title: Works great when it will start.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this unit for just over a year and I am disappointed with this unit, when it works it does a wonderful job, but the unit easily becomes plugged up even with fuel stabilizer ran through it. I have had to clean this unit twice now to get it to run correctly, and I constantly use stabalizer to prevent it from having carbon build up. But went to start the unit again and it will not start, changed spark plug, cleaned air filter and still nothing. The design leads me to think that this will be a constant issue. I bought two of these units and my father is having the same issue.
customer_reviews.author: David B Leach II

customer_reviews.title: Lol no wheels!
customer_reviews.text: Listed as having wheels, but none were shipped. Dissapointed as I can be, I wasn't looking to have two folks having to move it. Buyer beware ! ... also make sure you tell UPS to knock on the door and not to leave it in the front yard , this has been a bad experience and I have been a long time user.
customer_reviews.author: LONG TIME USER

customer_reviews.title: buy extra brushes
customer_reviews.text: its a good generator but make sure you buy extra brushes because they only lasted about 6months and then i had to order new ones
customer_reviews.author: adam lopez

customer_reviews.title: good for small r v
customer_reviews.text: the gen is easy to start not to noisey I got 32 ft with all the extras it will run or my over head air unites wiih every else I'm gonna take the onan out the motor runs great but want charge I gonna get me a electric start 4400 I will be good them some one got use for the onan contact me slimjohn95@yahoo.com
customer_reviews.author: john b

customer_reviews.title: Tailgating
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for Rangers opening day (tailgate). Ran it with a full gas tank from 9am to 7:30pm non- stop and still had PLENTY of gas. It performed GREAT. I had 2 15" (DJ) powered speakers - full blast, lcd tv, and several phone chargers. I also used it to charge my Macbook Pro for a couple of hours. No issues whats so ever. I heard other generators that were a lot louder...this one is relatively quiet. Placement is everything. Even some of the more expensive inverter types were not THAT much quieter. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: RAY

customer_reviews.title: stopped running 2 1/2 months, Oil leak day 1, warranty only covers parts, (no labor)
customer_reviews.text: Stopped running after 2 1/2 months, spark plug will not come out, oil leak day 1, warranty only covers parts only, (probably be able to buy a new one for the cost of labor to repair this one)
customer_reviews.author: RV

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy. You can not return this item. Garbage product. Stay clear of this porridge and company
customer_reviews.author: Doc Q

customer_reviews.title: generator
customer_reviews.text: it started right up when i put gas in it, i am getting the LP gas and will try that later. Its not really quiet but its not as loud as the older ones were. I am still waiting for my guaratee i paid 80 bucks for it never has come. but i do have a copy of it in my files so i can prove it.. as a whole great generator..
customer_reviews.author: donna cassidy

customer_reviews.title: Extra ratings will follow when first used
customer_reviews.text: Never actually fired this thing up but just to have it is what we were going for in the first pointCame as advertised and I am inch we have it all hooked up but we would’ve had to winterize it now anyway so I figured let’s just leave it unless we absolutely need it
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: One serious workmanship issue.
customer_reviews.text: Good: It has a breaker switch on the front panel, not just a reset like many generators. This makes it very easy to start the generator warming and connect a cable without verifying the load on the cable. It recommends straight 30 weight oil. It has a handy voltmeter on the front for quick verification of proper performance. Bad: Muffler weld cracked at about 50 hours. The pull string also frayed and broke, but was easily replaced. By 70 hours the muffler had fallen off. Summary: great design with some workmanship issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonia

customer_reviews.title: No wheels
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy the generator if you need it to be mobile. Can find the wheel kit anywhere online, it doesn’t look like they make it anymore. If you put it in your cart, Amazon will show you a wheel kit that is frequently bought with this generator but they are not compatible. The generator might be fine but I won’t have a chance to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Pickett

customer_reviews.title: ALERT! Look carefully. Wheels are optional and are NOT included. Misleading!!!
customer_reviews.text: Unpacking it I realized that there are NO wheels. The manual then showed them as optional. Sure, it is my fault I missed the text below the picture showing it with wheels, but it In my view this is very misleading - to say the least.
customer_reviews.author: upeter911

customer_reviews.title: Really good for the price you pay for it.
customer_reviews.text: After i got it three days late. It didn't come with oil so i had to go to auto zone for oil. And two out of four bolts that hold the gas tank to the frame we're loose. But it doe's start on the first pull. And it doe's run my 2.5 hp air compressor with no problem and it runs my 50 to 150 amp battery charger with no problem. Also it runs my R V. I just wish it was electric start and came with the wheel kit for easier maneuverability. But all in all is doing good so far.
customer_reviews.author: SCOTT WORTHEN

customer_reviews.title: Dependable unit
customer_reviews.text: Starts on the first or second pull every time. Absolutely no issues. It is loud and heavy but I'm assuming most generators are loud and heavy.
customer_reviews.author: fresh air child

customer_reviews.title: Adding oil
customer_reviews.text: I like this generator, especially the price. It started on the first pull after I added oil and gas. NOTICE. The manual says it holds 20 oz of oil. I started to add 16 ounces and it couldn't take it all. I had to clean up an oily mess.
customer_reviews.author: mountainmike

customer_reviews.title: Well worth every penny!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great price, arrived quickly, not too noisey. Had three power outages in the last month. Saved a chest freezer of meat. Paid for itself by the second use. Even threw a line to a senior neighbor to save her food!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Kidd

customer_reviews.title: Handles everything!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little genny. This is the only one I have owned or used. So I can only give my perspective on it. This generator is amazing, I have used this almost everyday for my job. I can go for several hours before needing to be refueled. It handles everything I need. I have my air compressor(30gal) lamps, electric lifts.
customer_reviews.author: tatiana abernathy

customer_reviews.title: Generator runs well...DuraStar customer service stinks
customer_reviews.text: Delivered to my house just fine. I connected the optional wheel kit without much of a problem. Started fine and ran a couple of test things I plugged into it. However, when I tried to contact their technical help via their website to ask a question about grounding of the unit (there is a lot of controversy about whether a generator like this needs to be externally grounded or not), they never returned an answer. If customer service is important to you...look elsewhere!
customer_reviews.author: Phaedrus

customer_reviews.title: Started on 1st pull!
customer_reviews.text: Instructions were generic and not model specific. They changed shipping brace bars so was confused when told to remove shipping brace. My model had 2 shipping brackets, not 1 long bar so kinda confusing. Other then that very happy with product!
customer_reviews.author: Tet Litzinger

product_meta.title: Durostar DS4000S Portable Generator, Yellow/Black
product_meta.description: Style:DS4000SGreat for camping, RVs, sporting events, home back-up power, job sites and more, the DuroStar DS4000S gas-powered generator has a 7. 0-horsepower air-cooled overhead valve engine with a recoil start that cranks out 3,300 constant running watts of power (and a peak of 4,000 watts). This rugged workhorse is ideal for a wide variety of uses from getting you through a power outage to keeping you and your family supplied with all the necessary conveniences of home while miles from civilization. The DS4000S has an 8-hour run time at 1/2 load, and it has a 4-gallon fuel tank that also includes an easily readable gauge. The heavy duty steel frame has four-point fully isolated motor mounts for smooth and quiet operation. Other features include a recoil start, super quiet muffler that reduces engine noise (69 dBA rating), and automatic low-oil shut off to protect the engine. An optional wheel kit is also available for the DS4000S, enabling easy portability. Backed by a 3-year limited . AMPERAGE- 27.50
feature_bullets: POWERFUL DUROSTAR ENGINE: The DS4000S is powered by a DuroStar 7 HP 208cc OHV engine with automatic low oil shutoff; Fuel Capacity: 3.96 Gallons; Noise Level: 69dB

PLENTY OF POWER: With 4,000 peak watts and 3,300 running watts, this unit is a workhorse that provides plenty of power to handle multiple jobs from powering high voltage appliances to heavy duty power tools
POWERING EVERYONE ANYWHERE: Like all DuroStar generators, the DS4000S is EPA and CARB approved for use in all 50 states
WHAT'S IN THE BOX: DuroStar DS4000S Generator, Oil Funnel, Sparkplug Wrench, Tool Set and Owner's Manual

POWER PANEL: Includes a selection of outlets for maximum compatibility in your applications including: 2 120V household outlets and 1 120V 30A twist lock outlet; Also includes a voltmeter for measuring voltage output

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars1,573 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
